name: LONNNGINNNG
description: At the height of the pandemic, we were all locked up, longing for embraces from friends and family. This work translates the psychological desire for the physical and manifests into one word with 4 "N"s more than it should. I miss being able to do so much with my life; we all do. I'm no different than you, the reader. Ideally this would look amazing taking up an entire NYC block on a wall. The scale could be monumental as we all feel this emotion on some level or another. Yes, even you Mr./Ms. introvert anti-socialite because I'm that same person; if I'm feeling it...so are you. It's so simple and tells you everything you need to know in one word. This is kind of a personal holy grail for text-based art. My aim is to always reduce an entire idea, concept, etc into the simplest form. I suppose it's like working with fractions, reducing down to the most common denominator. Minimalism can have the most powerful impact because of its purity; there are no distractions; no hiding; no gimmicks; no brush strokes; just information and context. The mind connects the dots...it's magic. I live for moments of breakthrough like this.
